item.title: How do i change max players
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

[quote=“BlackBeast666, post:2, topic:160491”]Try this:
search in you server file for:

	public static int MaxConnections

and change it e.g.
from:

[code]
public static int MaxConnections = 100000;
[/code
to:

	public static int MaxConnections = 10;

If I’m correct, Not totally sure.[/code][/quote]

Ask him first how much players he want max else he will have a server with 10 nulls.

Read full topic
